::Zardus::

Zardus watches Lady Hawk push the datapad away. He had to admit that 
she was a shrewed negotiator, but that didn't mean that he had to 
waste time with her experiments, although the warriors wern't urgent, 
so a little experimentation wouldn't be too bad if it got her to do 
her job right.

"Allright, I'll provide the material for you to do a little 
experimentation. After that you make me my bots."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:

Alliance

rather not

set the

tell you
> what to get for me or you can have a lesser scientist waste precious 
time
